title: Skin Vault + "Your" store Questions
body:
Hey guys,

Been pretty keen to get my hands on that Vandal Jax skin but sadly it's been discontinued.
So I was wondering if anyone knew exactly how that "Your Shop" business works.
I've seen alot of people running around these days with the Medieval Twitch skin so I'm assuming it's not too complicated.

Any info on how to get my hands on that bad boy, or how the shop system works would be killer.

replies.body:
Medieval Twitch dropped from honour capsules or something, that's why so many have it.

Just get lucky from hextech chests and you can get legacy content like Vandal Jax.
